> "I'm not good at tolerating bad news, you probably already know that."

"Not many people are." Lord Elder said as he leaned forward to stare
intently at Tuscon, his optics narrowing thoughtfully.

"What is it that you think you feel?" Elder said, his voice quiet and
calm as he watched Tuscon's facination with Optimus Prime.

Meanwhile the voices inside Tuscon have gone silent. The connection he
had with them is not severed, but it is as if they are listening for
something, or perhaps waiting.

(TAG)

OOC: Sandy, please don't change your character unless you want to. I
feel like the RP is bullying poor Tuscon, and I don't want to do that.
I apologize if I am. Do you have a stable email address I can send to.
I had a few thoughts I wanted to share with you, to see what you
think, and get your opinion.

I had sent another note, but got no response.

Preston
